BACKGROUND.szDescription: Enter a description here. This will show up in the laptop and can be up to 256 letters long.
Militant veterans of the ANC's struggle were not only versed in jungle warfare, but also in political theory.
Travel to virgin soil, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
An imposing sight on the battlefield, Grizzly is never one to shy away from taking the enemy head-on.
Working day and night in her car repair shop when she's not travelling around the world, Vicky is a very versed mechanic. But she never overcame her fear of heights.
The difference to MacGyver is that he does use guns.
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
Ivan's training program is the stuff of nightmares, but it pays off evidently.
Just because it involves no shooting, it doesn't have to be less dangerous.
Serving in the Russian campaign in Chechnya, Igor is used to harsh environments.
The Rangers form the elite of Us army infantry.
Sapper can make only two mistakes in his life. The first one is a career choice.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Wether you call them terrorists or freedom fighters often depends on your relation to those killed.
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to the grim business.
Some people join this business not out of necessity. While easy to label them as sissy aristocrats, some are actually quite capable, as they have received the best training money can buy.
Your exploits earned you respect and recognition you deserve. Who needs legs?
That combination will at least spice up your resume.
Just like boyscouts. But with with violence. So not like boyscouts at all.
Like a surgeon... cutting for the very first time... Just kidding. Spider is THE person to seek if your guts are spilling out.
Cliff is a highly qualified doctor, though there once was a... darker... time in his life.
In longer and larger conflicts, former prison guards are natural choices for running prison camps.
This might be Frank's last tour - there are several private organisations that are interested in recruiting him to train their staff.
Turned down by her big love, Buzz is currently filled with a lot of hatred She chose the right job it seems.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blasting sounds, fireworks, screaming people - isn't it odd how similar stage is to the battlefield?
The Green Berets are a special operations force tasked with unconventional warfare.
If you want to put your life to risk, might as well earn cash by it...
When offered to take it or leave it, you always chose 'take'.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Dr. Q is trained in the arts of ancient Chinese medicine. Not the fastest way to cure a patient, but it works.
Becoming a mercenary is a natural step for many gang members - job's the same, tools and pay much better.
Who needs an exam to be a practicing healer?

The british Special Air Service is one of the world's most famous special forces units, and is not only trained in survival techniques in all environments, it is also exceptionally well versed in airborne missions.
Just like boyscouts. But with violence. So not like boyscouts at all.
Fresh outta school, with diploma still warm in a hand, it's time to finally make yourself a living.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Your childhood left you with significant personal issues that have yet to be solved.
You chose the awesome life of a mercenary, visit new places, meet new people, and kill them. And even get paid for it.
Overalls, straw sticking out of boots and inseparable blade of grass in the mouth. Not exactly a proud image, but hey, life on the farm isn't easy.
There are different accounts of how you've managed to leave the confinement, but everyone agrees - you should go back.
Experience earned in years of arms trade leads to better deals when buying and selling guns.
Most of your knowledge comes from the books and secondhand reports - and it didn't prepare you for a grim reality of a war zone as well as you thought.
Given the nature of today's drugs, addicts can make fearsome, yet unreliable, opponents.
This... this is it! I get it now. HEAR THAT? I GET IT NOW!
Flunked out of the military academy, but not yet finished.
Living in the Urban jungle for quite a few years surely has its merits.
Look at this guy. Now look at you. Still feel like escaping?
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
The only hope left for his oppressed people, Miguel IS the revolution.
Miguel's right hand, Carlos keeps the men in line.
Aid worker turned rebel, Ira does what she can to keep the rebels alive.
One might mistake him for a simpleton, but being alive after all these years proves Dimitri is made of sterner stuff.
Once building his bombs for the IRA, Devin recently considered selling his devices to other customers as well.
Not needed!
The indigenous people of Metavira have adjusted to the hostile jungle there. After the liberation, some joined the foreigners, and sought their luck elsewhere.
Nobody admits it, but the same governments that hunt him employ him.
Not needed!
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
A veteran of international conflict, Iggy found himself on the wrong side of the conflict until he joined the rebellion.
Frustrated by the anguish and misery he sees everyday, Vince has decided it might be time fo more active resistance against the queen.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Not needed!
Not entirely sane, not entirely crazy, your life is at a crossroads.
Overalls, straw sticking out of boots and inseparable blade of grass in the mouth. Not exactly a proud image, but hey, life on the farm isn't easy.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
Living the life of an evil ruler of a small country certainly leads to astonishing survival talents.
Old people. They never seem to sleep.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Notorious mass-murderer? Insane criminal? They're just jealous.
Wanted by Interpol, terrorists know how to live undercover unnoticed.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
You don't want to know.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
So much angst.
You know the risk selling weapons to both sides, but the profit margin is just that good.
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Travel to virgin soil, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
Used to physical stress over long periods, some pilots find the transition to ground combat surprisingly easy.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Many devout followers of any religion or cult area surprisingly violent and zealous if pushed in the right (or wrong) direction.
Not needed!
Former law enforcement personnel often seek work in the mercenary world, and are the logical choice for handling captives.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Mess with him, you mess with the entire family...
Paranoid, ignorant, fascist - yep, that's you.
Wanted by Interpol, terrorists know how to live undercover unnoticed.
Not needed!
And there goes the Geneva convention...
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Could you take a picture, please?
Could you take a picture, please?
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Target of thrown popcorn in cinemas around the world, scoffed by critics yet adored by loyal fans.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
In hsi prime, he'd have put all you youngsters to shame.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Not needed!
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to the grim business.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Not needed!
One would expect a constant abuse and ridicule you withstand to finally lead you to reconsidering your life choices. Nope.
Not needed!
Not needed!
The best (and likely only) heli mechanic in Arulco.
A personal friend of Deidranna and ruthless exploiter. How did you manage to recruit her?
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.

For many people, their trade IS trade.
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Overalls, straw sticking out of boots and inseparable blade of grass in the mouth. Not exactly a proud image, but hey, life on the farm isn't easy.

A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
No matter if it's a thirty years old junk or latest electronic gadget, tech whiz can rewire, reassemble and reconfigure it with eyes closed.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Nations of the entire world provide these troops to solve all conflicts without any violence. Sadly, this statment is false.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Target of thrown popcorn in cinemas around the world, scoffed by critics yet adored by loyal fans.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
Not needed!
With russian stoicism, the red army prevailed against Hitler, father frost, and chronic shortages.
With russian stoicism, the red army prevailed against Hitler, father frost, and chronic shortages.
With russian stoicism, the red army prevailed against Hitler, father frost, and chronic shortages.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
Let's hope you are as good evading bullets as you are evading knifes while tied to a board.
Formed after the disastrous Munich massacre in 1972, GSG9 is a german counter-terrorism unit.
The Studies and Observations Group was a classified special forces unit conductong unconventional warfare in Vietnam.
There are different accounts of how you've managed to leave the confinement, but everyone agrees - you should go back.
You know all about your teammates, wether or not they care.
It might be more of a spectacle than actual fight, but getting thrown around a ring without breaking a neck still takes a lot of skill.

Several years of evaluating human lives ironically left your own health in disrepair - cheap cigarrettes flushed down with strong coffee took their toll. The object-like way you started to treat your patients also doesn't make you very popular.
When you've seen it all, nothing can frighten you anymore.
Due to extreme shortsightedness Wally is a poor shot with next to no chance of improvement.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
Versatile and educated doctor can save a human life no matter what his patient caught - a virus or a bullet.
Air conditioning, watered down coffee and some papers to push - what else can you expect from life?
Fresh outta school, with diploma still warm in a hand, it's time to finally make yourself a living.
Not needed!
If your team ever needs someone to throw grenades on an even field, you'll be the man.
No matter if it's a thirty years old junk or latest electronic gadget, tech whiz can rewire, reassemble and reconfigure it with eyes closed.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
The indigenous people of Metavira have adjusted to the hostile jungle there. After the liberation, some joined the foreigners, and sought their luck elsewhere.
The indigenous people of Metavira have adjusted to the hostile jungle there. After the liberation, some joined the foreigners, and sought their luck elsewhere.
Leaders of their communities since ages long forgotten, shamans posess medical knowledge unknown to western eyes.

You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
Not needed!
Not needed!
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to the grim business.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.

When you enter a ward, all medical personnel tries to look overly busy or hides around corners in a futile attempt to avoid you. The List of your possible afflictions just keeps getting bigger and bigger!
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back while under fire is a quest for the best!
Cut off from everyone, Manuel is a natural survivor.
Very useful, as long as you HAVE a car.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Spam was frustrated by the lack of a strong mandate that forced him to do nothing. On the plus side, he is used to being fired at.
The Rangers form the elite of Us army infantry.
Anyone surviving in a merciless prison is bound to be more dangerous on release - if he survives that long.
Some people display a knack for shooting, and a disturbing aggression against innocent paper bull's eyes.
Bob is no stranger to tense situations, and lets others feel that as well.
While others may keep to their pasts and its labels, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
You make things go BOOM!
A somewhat unorthodox background for a mercenary, former lawyers might be useful when there's a deal to be made on a knife's edge.
When you want to break enemy morale by blowing up his privy, it's time to get yourself a qualified pyrotechnician.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
An expert in the workings an history of firearms, the army's curious assortment of arms is this man's dream come true.
Well, that didn't go as planned.
Many devout followers of any religion or cult area surprisingly violent and zealous if pushed in the right (or wrong) direction.
Versatile and educated doctor can save a human life no matter what his patient caught - a virus or a bullet.
A expert in both legal and illegal observation methods. Curiously, his resume never said where he learned all this.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
When you want to break enemy morale by blowing up his privy, it's time to get yourself a qualified pyrotechnician.
Nobody takes you seriously, because you used to walk around in a silly costume? Well, a children's smile is enough compensation!
Hey detective, did you manage to solve the case of the disappearing donuts yet?
Not needed!
Fresh outta school, with diploma still warm in a hand, it's time to finally make yourself a living.
多年的武器倒卖经验使得此人在买卖枪支弹药时， 更善于抬价砍价。
城管出身的佼佼者们更乐意在杀手的世界谋求一职， 他们当然最擅长审讯犯人。
担心监狱的暴徒们举兵反攻么？ 监狱看守是你最好的选择。
成为佣兵是很多黑帮成员的自然选择： 工作差不多，武器和薪水好多了！
任何熬到刑满释放的囚犯都容易变得非常暴力： 如果能熬到那一天的话。
深受毒品影响， 瘾君子可以变成恐怖的、不稳定的对手。
比起那些玩豪车美女的娘娘腔败家子， 有些富二代确实接受过顶级的特工训练。
虽然让他们做佣兵可能强人所难， 不过在紧急关头他们也能派上用场。
接受过严格的军事训练， 地面作战对他们而言可能不是很难。
宗教的力量是恐怖而巨大的， 用好它可以改写历史。
护士在战区是很吃香的， 因为太危险了，专业医生往往不愿意前往。
建筑工人都是卖苦力的， 他们体格壮实，擅长建造碉堡和搬砖。
喜欢冒险吗，喜欢生死不卜的感觉？ 试试跳伞吧。

BACKGROUNDS.BACKGROUND: 269 教官 教官 教官的工作就是训练新兵蛋子： 让那些年轻男女留下心灵创伤。t>

BACKGROUND.szDescription: 保安有打架的经验， 不过杀人这一块可能略有生疏。
杀手是危险而又高度专业的职业， 其实他们有些并不太冷。
恐怖分子还是自由斗士？ 有时取决于你和他们杀死的人是什么关系。
精良训练，无比忠诚，不惧牺牲， 不愧为雇主的最佳选择。
设身于最危险的都市角落， SWAT特工擅长处理高度专业的军事和政治行动。
友好点，很多暴力就泯灭于无形： 和气生财嘛！
黑煤窑的工作既辛苦又危险， 难怪有些人宁愿选择死在战场上。
有组织的犯罪网络随处可见， 没有例外。
各国合作提供部队，采用非暴力方式解决区域冲突。 可悲的是，这个定义是错的。
与其面对上级那张抽脸， 索性跳下去算了！
我们都是神枪手， 每一颗子弹消灭一个敌人。
尚未经过战火洗礼， 但至少通过了基本训练。
瞄准射击很容易， 难得是教会别人瞄准谁射击。
像童子军一样，只不过使用了暴力。 所以...这还是是童子军呀。
苏联红军克服了严寒天气和物资缺乏， 最终弄死了希特勒。
每天都和死亡与尸体打交道， 最终发现自己什么都不怕了！
经过了几场战役血与火的洗礼， 第一时间发现危险已成为本能。
图阿雷格人生活在撒哈拉沙漠， 过着游牧生活。
有些工作即使不需要持枪射击， 也会十分危险。
有些人一拿起枪就热血沸腾， 恨不得把地球打穿。
对于某些人而言， 他们的工作就是点钞票。
非常有用， 当然如果你有车的话。
在物资缺乏的战场上， 能维修装备太重要了！
反恐精英一般处理国际事务， 国内？有城管和武警呢。
嗡嗡的空调、打翻的杯子和乱七八糟的资料， 这就是办公室的生活。
灯光、音效和尖叫的观众， 其实和战场也没什么区别不是吗？
技术宅拯救世界。就算闭着一只眼睛， 技术宅也能在一分钟内摆好魔方。
毕业工作不好找？不想读大学？ 来当杀手吧！
习惯性会顺手拿走一切看得顺眼的东西， 其实是下意识的本能。
看到你的贱笑， 敌人就忍不住放下手里的枪捂肚子了。
中老年妇女的偶像，大木老师和毕姥爷毕生追求的目标， 你的名声已享誉世界。
如果你想用节日礼炮把敌人的茅房炸开花， 你最好找一个专业的烟火商。
拆弹专家一生只允许犯两个错误： 第一个错误是选了这职业。
哪怕走进医院或学校， 也会觉得他们会偷偷暗害你！
头发插着枯稻草，张嘴一笑缺颗牙， 好吧，农场的生活也不是那么容易。
其实不必那么费力气， 兄弟，上网吧！
绝大部分知识都是纸上谈兵却偏偏喜欢大放厥词， 你们还是赶快去战场死掉吧！
没有人知道你是怎么逃出来的， 不过大家一致认为，你应该回去。
与其说是搏斗不如说是表演， 不过被丢来丢去而没摔断脖子也需要一定的技术。
从感冒到绝症无所不能， 取出你大脑里的子弹更是不在话下。
谁都能把人切成两半， 但能不能缝上去就是另一回事。
不满足于平庸而无聊的过去，你选择了枪炮主宰的世界， 这才是真正的你。
新人还在包尿布时你已经威名远扬， 没有什么任务能难住你。
擅长于猎杀各种珍奇异兽， 包括女王的手下。
经过周密计算后你标记了目标： 几秒后一颗子弹就会飞向他。
微小的失误就会导致失误， 幸好你还没犯过错。
